title: Trochanteric Bursitis Management
content: Trochanteric bursitis presents with lateral hip pain over the greater trochanter. Treatment includes activity modification, NSAIDs, and physical therapy focusing on iliotibial band stretching and hip abductor strengthening. Corticosteroid injection provides significant relief in most cases. Recalcitrant cases may benefit from platelet-rich plasma injection or surgical intervention including bursectomy and iliotibial band release.
